trans-unit.source: Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to download and install the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, an MMC snap-in for managing StorSimple data protection and backup features.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to download and install the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, an MMC snap-in for managing StorSimple data protection and backup features.

trans-unit.source: Deploy the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in
trans-unit.target: Deploy the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager is a Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in that simplifies data protection and backup management in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple environment.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager is a Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in that simplifies data protection and backup management in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple environment.

trans-unit.source: With StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you can manage Microsoft Azure StorSimple on-premises and cloud storage as if it were a fully integrated storage system, thus simplifying backup and restore processes and reducing costs.
trans-unit.target: With StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you can manage Microsoft Azure StorSimple on-premises and cloud storage as if it were a fully integrated storage system, thus simplifying backup and restore processes and reducing costs.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes configuration requirements, as well as procedures for installing, removing, and upgrading StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes configuration requirements, as well as procedures for installing, removing, and upgrading StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager installation
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager installation

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager can be installed on computers that are running the Windows Server® 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, or Windows Server 2012 R2 operating system.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager can be installed on computers that are running the Windows Server® 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, or Windows Server 2012 R2 operating system.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] On servers running Windows 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] On servers running Windows 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Before you install or upgrade the StorSimple Snapshot Manager snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), make sure that the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device and host server are configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: Before you install or upgrade the StorSimple Snapshot Manager snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), make sure that the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device and host server are configured correctly.

trans-unit.source: Configure prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Configure prerequisites

trans-unit.source: The following steps provide a high-level overview of configuration tasks that you must complete before you install the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: The following steps provide a high-level overview of configuration tasks that you must complete before you install the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: For complete Microsoft Azure StorSimple configuration and setup information, including system requirements and step-by-step instructions, see [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).
trans-unit.target: For complete Microsoft Azure StorSimple configuration and setup information, including system requirements and step-by-step instructions, see [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Before you begin, review the [Deployment configuration checklist](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-configuration-checklist) and
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Before you begin, review the [Deployment configuration checklist](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-configuration-checklist) and

trans-unit.source: and [Deployment prerequisites](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-prerequisites) in [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).
trans-unit.target: and [Deployment prerequisites](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-prerequisites) in [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).

trans-unit.source: Before you install StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Before you install StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Unpack, mount, and connect the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device as described in [Install your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md) or [Install your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md).
trans-unit.target: Unpack, mount, and connect the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device as described in [Install your StorSimple 8100 device](storsimple-8100-hardware-installation.md) or [Install your StorSimple 8600 device](storsimple-8600-hardware-installation.md).

trans-unit.source: Make sure that your host computer is running one of the following operating systems:
trans-unit.target: Make sure that your host computer is running one of the following operating systems:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 (on servers running Windows 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 (on servers running Windows 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] For a StorSimple virtual device, the host must be a Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] For a StorSimple virtual device, the host must be a Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you meet all the Microsoft Azure StorSimple configuration requirements.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that you meet all the Microsoft Azure StorSimple configuration requirements.

trans-unit.source: For details, go to [Deployment prerequisites](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-prerequisites).
trans-unit.target: For details, go to [Deployment prerequisites](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-prerequisites).

trans-unit.source: Connect the device to the host and perform the initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: Connect the device to the host and perform the initial configuration.

trans-unit.source: For details, go to [Deployment steps](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-steps).
trans-unit.target: For details, go to [Deployment steps](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#deployment-steps).

trans-unit.source: Create volumes on the device, assign them to the host, and verify that the host can mount and use them.
trans-unit.target: Create volumes on the device, assign them to the host, and verify that the host can mount and use them.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager supports the following types of volumes:
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager supports the following types of volumes:

trans-unit.source: Basic volumes
trans-unit.target: Basic volumes

trans-unit.source: Simple volumes
trans-unit.target: Simple volumes

trans-unit.source: Dynamic volumes
trans-unit.target: Dynamic volumes

trans-unit.source: Mirrored dynamic volumes (RAID 1)
trans-unit.target: Mirrored dynamic volumes (RAID 1)

trans-unit.source: Cluster-shared volumes
trans-unit.target: Cluster-shared volumes

trans-unit.source: For information about creating volumes on the StorSimple device or StorSimple virtual device, go to [Step 6: Create a volume](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#step-6-create-a-volume), in [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about creating volumes on the StorSimple device or StorSimple virtual device, go to [Step 6: Create a volume](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#step-6-create-a-volume), in [Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md).

trans-unit.source: Install a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Install a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Before installing StorSimple Snapshot Manager, make sure that the volumes you created on the StorSimple device or StorSimple virtual device are mounted, initialized, and formatted as described in [Configure prerequisites](#configure-prerequisites).
trans-unit.target: Before installing StorSimple Snapshot Manager, make sure that the volumes you created on the StorSimple device or StorSimple virtual device are mounted, initialized, and formatted as described in [Configure prerequisites](#configure-prerequisites).

trans-unit.source: For a StorSimple virtual device, the host must be a Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: For a StorSimple virtual device, the host must be a Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: The host must be running Windows 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, or Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: The host must be running Windows 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, or Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: If your server is running Windows Server 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: If your server is running Windows Server 2008 R2, you must also install Windows Server 2008 SP1 and Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: You must configure an iSCSI connection from the host to the StorSimple device before you can connect the device to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: You must configure an iSCSI connection from the host to the StorSimple device before you can connect the device to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to complete a fresh installation of StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to complete a fresh installation of StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: If you are installing an upgrade, go to [Upgrade or reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager](#upgrade-or-reinstall-storsimple-snapshot-manager).
trans-unit.target: If you are installing an upgrade, go to [Upgrade or reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager](#upgrade-or-reinstall-storsimple-snapshot-manager).

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Install StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Install StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Verify the connection to the device
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Verify the connection to the device

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Install StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Install StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to install StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to install StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To install StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: To install StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Download the StorSimple Snapshot Manager software (go to [StorSimple Snapshot Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44220) in the Microsoft Download Center) and save it locally on the host.
trans-unit.target: Download the StorSimple Snapshot Manager software (go to [StorSimple Snapshot Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44220) in the Microsoft Download Center) and save it locally on the host.

trans-unit.source: In File Explorer, right-click the compressed folder, and then click **Extract all**.
trans-unit.target: In File Explorer, right-click the compressed folder, and then click **Extract all**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Extract Compressed (Zipped) Folders** window, in the **Select a destination and extract files** box, type or browse to the path where you would like to file to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: In the **Extract Compressed (Zipped) Folders** window, in the **Select a destination and extract files** box, type or browse to the path where you would like to file to be extracted.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Show extracted files when complete** check box, and then click **Extract**.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Show extracted files when complete** check box, and then click **Extract**.

trans-unit.source: Extract files dialog box
trans-unit.target: Extract files dialog box

trans-unit.source: When the extraction is finished, the destination folder opens.
trans-unit.target: When the extraction is finished, the destination folder opens.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the application setup icon that appears in the destination folder.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the application setup icon that appears in the destination folder.

trans-unit.source: When the **Setup Successful** message appears, click **Close**.
trans-unit.target: When the **Setup Successful** message appears, click **Close**.

trans-unit.source: You should see the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.
trans-unit.target: You should see the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.

trans-unit.source: desktop icon
trans-unit.target: desktop icon

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device
trans-unit.target: To connect StorSimple Snapshot Manager to a device

trans-unit.source: Click the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.
trans-unit.target: Click the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager window appears.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager window appears.

trans-unit.source: The window contains a **Scope** pane, a **Results** pane, and an **Actions** pane.
trans-unit.target: The window contains a **Scope** pane, a **Results** pane, and an **Actions** pane.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface

trans-unit.source: The **Scope** pane (the left pane) contains a list of nodes organized in a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: The **Scope** pane (the left pane) contains a list of nodes organized in a tree structure.

trans-unit.source: You can expand some nodes to select a view or specific data related to that node.
trans-unit.target: You can expand some nodes to select a view or specific data related to that node.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow icon to expand or collapse a node.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow icon to expand or collapse a node.

trans-unit.source: Right-click an item in the **Scope** pane to see a list of available actions for that item.
trans-unit.target: Right-click an item in the **Scope** pane to see a list of available actions for that item.

trans-unit.source: The **Results** pane (the center pane) contains detailed status information about the node, view, or data that you selected in the **Scope** pane.
trans-unit.target: The **Results** pane (the center pane) contains detailed status information about the node, view, or data that you selected in the **Scope** pane.

trans-unit.source: The **Actions** pane lists the operations that you can perform on the node, view, or data that you selected in the **Scope** pane.
trans-unit.target: The **Actions** pane lists the operations that you can perform on the node, view, or data that you selected in the **Scope** pane.

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface, see [StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface](storsimple-use-snapshot-manager.md).
trans-unit.target: For a complete description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface, see [StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface](storsimple-use-snapshot-manager.md).

trans-unit.source: In the **Scope** pane, right-click the **Devices** node, and then click **Configure a device**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Scope** pane, right-click the **Devices** node, and then click **Configure a device**.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure a Device** dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The **Configure a Device** dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: Configure a device
trans-unit.target: Configure a device

trans-unit.source: In the **Device** list box, select the IP address of the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device or virtual device.
trans-unit.target: In the **Device** list box, select the IP address of the Microsoft Azure StorSimple device or virtual device.

trans-unit.source: In the **Password** text box, type the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password that you created for the device in the Microsoft Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: In the **Password** text box, type the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password that you created for the device in the Microsoft Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager searches for the device that you identified.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager searches for the device that you identified.

trans-unit.source: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.
trans-unit.target: If the device is available, StorSimple Snapshot Manager adds a connection.

trans-unit.source: You can [verify the connection to the device](#to-verify-the-connection) to confirm that the connection was added successfully.
trans-unit.target: You can [verify the connection to the device](#to-verify-the-connection) to confirm that the connection was added successfully.

trans-unit.source: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.
trans-unit.target: If the device is unavailable for any reason, StorSimple Snapshot Manager returns an error message.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK** to close the error message, and then click **Cancel** to close the **Configure a Device** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK** to close the error message, and then click **Cancel** to close the **Configure a Device** dialog box.

trans-unit.source: When it connects to a device, StorSimple Snapshot Manager imports each volume group configured for that device, provided that the volume group has associated backups.
trans-unit.target: When it connects to a device, StorSimple Snapshot Manager imports each volume group configured for that device, provided that the volume group has associated backups.

trans-unit.source: Volume groups that do not have associated backups are not imported.
trans-unit.target: Volume groups that do not have associated backups are not imported.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, backup policies that were created for a volume group are not imported.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, backup policies that were created for a volume group are not imported.

trans-unit.source: To see the imported groups, right-click the top-most **Volume Groups** node in the **Scope** pane, and click **Toggle imported groups**.
trans-unit.target: To see the imported groups, right-click the top-most **Volume Groups** node in the **Scope** pane, and click **Toggle imported groups**.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Verify the connection to the device
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Verify the connection to the device

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to verify that StorSimple Snapshot Manager is connected to the StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to verify that StorSimple Snapshot Manager is connected to the StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To verify the connection
trans-unit.target: To verify the connection

trans-unit.source: In the **Scope** pane, click the **Devices** node.
trans-unit.target: In the **Scope** pane, click the **Devices** node.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager device status
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager device status

trans-unit.source: Check the **Results** pane:
trans-unit.target: Check the **Results** pane:

trans-unit.source: If a green indicator appears on the device icon and **Available** appears in the **Status** column, then the device is connected.
trans-unit.target: If a green indicator appears on the device icon and **Available** appears in the **Status** column, then the device is connected.

trans-unit.source: If a red indicator appears on the device icon and Unavailable appears in the **Status** column, then the device is not connected.
trans-unit.target: If a red indicator appears on the device icon and Unavailable appears in the **Status** column, then the device is not connected.

trans-unit.source: If **Refreshing** appears in the **Status** column, then StorSimple Snapshot Manager is retrieving volume groups and associated backups for a connected device.
trans-unit.target: If **Refreshing** appears in the **Status** column, then StorSimple Snapshot Manager is retrieving volume groups and associated backups for a connected device.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade or reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Upgrade or reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: You should uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager completely before you upgrade or reinstall the software.
trans-unit.target: You should uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager completely before you upgrade or reinstall the software.

trans-unit.source: Before reinstalling StorSimple Snapshot Manager, back up the existing StorSimple Snapshot Manager database on the host computer.
trans-unit.target: Before reinstalling StorSimple Snapshot Manager, back up the existing StorSimple Snapshot Manager database on the host computer.

trans-unit.source: This saves the backup policies and configuration information so that you can easily restore this data from backup.
trans-unit.target: This saves the backup policies and configuration information so that you can easily restore this data from backup.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps if you are upgrading or reinstalling StorSimple Snapshot Manager:
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps if you are upgrading or reinstalling StorSimple Snapshot Manager:

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Back up the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Back up the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager and restore the database
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager and restore the database

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: To uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: To uninstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: On the host computer, open the **Control Panel**, click **Programs**, and then click **Programs and Features**.
trans-unit.target: On the host computer, open the **Control Panel**, click **Programs**, and then click **Programs and Features**.

trans-unit.source: In the left pane, click **Uninstall or change a program**.
trans-unit.target: In the left pane, click **Uninstall or change a program**.

trans-unit.source: Right-click **StorSimple Snapshot Manager**, and then click **Uninstall**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click **StorSimple Snapshot Manager**, and then click **Uninstall**.

trans-unit.source: This starts the StorSimple Snapshot Manager Setup program.
trans-unit.target: This starts the StorSimple Snapshot Manager Setup program.

trans-unit.source: Click **Modify Setup**, and then click **Uninstall**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Modify Setup**, and then click **Uninstall**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If there are any MMC processes running in the background, such as StorSimple Snapshot Manager or Disk Management, the uninstall will fail and you will receive a message to close all instances of MMC before you attempt to uninstall the program.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If there are any MMC processes running in the background, such as StorSimple Snapshot Manager or Disk Management, the uninstall will fail and you will receive a message to close all instances of MMC before you attempt to uninstall the program.

trans-unit.source: Select **Automatically close applications and attempt to restart them after setup is complete**, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Automatically close applications and attempt to restart them after setup is complete**, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: When the uninstall process is finished, a **Setup Successful** message appears.
trans-unit.target: When the uninstall process is finished, a **Setup Successful** message appears.

trans-unit.source: Click **Close**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Close**.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Back up the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Back up the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to create and save a copy of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to create and save a copy of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database.

trans-unit.source: To back up the database
trans-unit.target: To back up the database

trans-unit.source: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start Server Manager.

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Stop the service**.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Stop the service**.

trans-unit.source: Stop the StorSimple Manager service
trans-unit.target: Stop the StorSimple Manager service

trans-unit.source: Browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.
trans-unit.target: Browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] ProgramData is a hidden folder.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] ProgramData is a hidden folder.

trans-unit.source: Find the catalog XML file, copy the file, and store the copy in a safe location or in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Find the catalog XML file, copy the file, and store the copy in a safe location or in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple backup catalog file
trans-unit.target: StorSimple backup catalog file

trans-unit.source: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Services** page, select the **Microsoft StorSimple Management Servic**e.
trans-unit.target: On the **Services** page, select the **Microsoft StorSimple Management Servic**e.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Restart the service**.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Restart the service**.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager and restore the database
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager and restore the database

trans-unit.source: To reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager, follow the steps in [Install a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager](#install-a-new-storsimple-snapshot-manager).
trans-unit.target: To reinstall StorSimple Snapshot Manager, follow the steps in [Install a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager](#install-a-new-storsimple-snapshot-manager).

trans-unit.source: Then, use the following procedure to restore the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database.
trans-unit.target: Then, use the following procedure to restore the StorSimple Snapshot Manager database.

trans-unit.source: To restore the database
trans-unit.target: To restore the database

trans-unit.source: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Stop the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start Server Manager.

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Stop the service**.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Stop the service**.

trans-unit.source: Browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.
trans-unit.target: Browse to C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\StorSimple\BACatalog.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] ProgramData is a hidden folder.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] ProgramData is a hidden folder.

trans-unit.source: Delete the catalog XML file, and replace it with the version that you saved earlier.
trans-unit.target: Delete the catalog XML file, and replace it with the version that you saved earlier.

trans-unit.source: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:
trans-unit.target: Restart the Microsoft StorSimple Management Service:

trans-unit.source: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.
trans-unit.target: On the Server Manager Dashboard, on the **Tools** menu, select **Services**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Services** page, select **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Restart the service**.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, under **Microsoft StorSimple Management Service**, click **Restart the service**.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
